segments.text: Excuse me , what time do you expect to land in Berlin ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We should be there by 5 this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any idea how long it will take to clean customs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it all depends on traffic from other arriving aircraft .
segments.speaker: S2
